SELECT C.ORGNZT_NM ORGNZT_NM , B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE KNO_TYPE_CD , B.KNWLDG_TY_NM KNO_TYPE_NM , D.USER_NM USER_NM , A.EXPERT_GRAD APP_TYPE_CD , DATE_FORMAT(A.EXPERT_CONFM_DE,'%Y-%m-%d') SPE_CONFM_DE , A.EXPERT_ID SPE_ID , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID FRST_REGISTER_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID LAST_UPDUSR_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM FROM COMTNDAMPRO A, COMTNDAMMAPKNO B, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM C, COMVNUSERMASTER D WHERE C.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE AND A.EXPERT_ID = D.ESNTL_ID
AND binary(D.USER_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND binary(B.KNWLDG_TY_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNDAMPRO A, COMTNDAMMAPKNO B, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM C, COMVNUSERMASTER D WHERE C.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE AND A.EXPERT_ID = D.ESNTL_ID
AND binary(D.USER_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND binary(B.KNWLDG_TY_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT C.ORGNZT_NM orgnztNm , C.ORGNZT_ID orgnztId , A.EXPERT_ID speId , D.USER_NM userNm , B.KNWLDG_TY_NM knoTypeNm , B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE knoTypeCd , A.EXPERT_GRAD appTypeCd , A.EXPERT_DC speExpCn , DATE_FORMAT(A.EXPERT_CONFM_DE,'%Y-%m-%d') speConfmDe , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID frstRegisterId , DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') frstRegistPnttm , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID lastUpdusrId , DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') lastUpdusrPnttm FROM COMTNDAMPRO A, COMTNDAMMAPKNO B, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM C, COMVNUSERMASTER D WHERE C.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE AND A.EXPERT_ID = D.ESNTL_ID AND A.EXPERT_ID = #{speId} AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = #{knoTypeCd} AND A.EXPERT_GRAD = #{appTypeCd}
